trans-unit.source: Implements a multiple-input, single-output compositor for two-dimensional (2-D) transformations in a shared coordinate space.
A <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D> object treats a collection of manipulators as a composite object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D>物件視操作工具的集合為複合物件。

trans-unit.source: Your application is then freed from the necessity of tracking and managing individual manipulators.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式接著會從您不再需要追蹤和管理個別的操作工具釋出。

trans-unit.source: A manipulation processor by itself does not cause an element to move.
trans-unit.target: 操作處理器本身並不會移動的項目。

trans-unit.source: Your application begins a manipulation as necessary, and then receives information from a manipulation processor by listening to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Delta> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Completed> events.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式開始操作，如有必要，但收到資訊操作處理器從透過接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started>，<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Delta>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Completed>事件。

trans-unit.source: The values received via these events enable you to change the location, size or orientation of an element as needed.
trans-unit.target: 透過這些事件接收的值可讓您變更的位置、 大小或方向所需的項目。

trans-unit.source: You inform a manipulation processor which types of manipulations are allowed (translate, scale, rotate) by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.SupportedManipulations%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通知操作處理器會在允許的操作類型 （平移、 縮放、 旋轉） 藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.SupportedManipulations%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can then provide non-conditional logic to the transformation of the element that is being manipulated.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以提供給受管理的項目轉換的非條件式邏輯。

trans-unit.source: For instance, instead of checking if rotation is enabled before changing the orientation of an element, you can unconditionally apply the rotation factor received from the manipulation processor; if rotation is not enabled, the manipulation processor will report that no rotational change has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，而不是檢查是否循環已啟用變更方向的項目之前，您可以無條件地套用操作處理器; 從收到的循環因數如果未啟用旋轉，操作處理器會報告發生沒有旋轉的變更。

trans-unit.source: When an element that is being manipulated is released (all manipulators are removed), you can use inertia processing to simulate friction and cause the element to gradually slow its movements before coming to a stop.
trans-unit.target: 釋放所操作的項目 （所有操作工具會遭到移除），您可以使用慣性處理模擬人事而造成要在停止前逐漸減緩其移動的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D" /> object.
The initial set of supported manipulations.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D" /> object.
The <paramref name="supportedManipulations" /> parameter is not a valid combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulations2D" /> enumeration values.
The initial set of supported manipulations.
Pivot information for single-manipulator rotations.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D" /> object.
The <paramref name="supportedManipulations" /> parameter is not a valid combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulations2D" /> enumeration values.
Occurs when a manipulation has competed.
The timestamp to complete the manipulation, in 100-nanosecond ticks.
Forces the current manipulation to complete and raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Completed" /> event.
The timestamp is less than the previous timestamp for the current manipulation.
Occurs when the manipulation origin has changed or when translation, scaling, or rotation have occurred.

The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Delta?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Delta?displayProperty=nameWithType> event are the same type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Delta?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Delta?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件都是相同的型別。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you can use the same event handler for both events.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您可以使用相同的事件處理常式，兩個事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum radius, in coordinate units, necessary for a manipulator to participate in scaling and rotation.
The minimum radius, in coordinate units, necessary for a manipulator to participate in scaling and rotation.
trans-unit.target: 最小的半徑，以座標為單位，所需的參與縮放和旋轉的操作工具。

trans-unit.source: If a manipulator is extremely close to the center of mass of the manipulators currently being processed, a very small manipulator motion can become a very large change to rotation or scaling.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作工具非常接近操作工具目前正在處理中心的大量，非常小的操作工具移動可能會變得非常大變更旋轉或縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, set <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.MinimumScaleRotateRadius%2A> to something greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.MinimumScaleRotateRadius%2A>為大於零的項目。

trans-unit.source: Any manipulator that is closer than that distance to the center of mass will not be included in rotation and scaling operations.
trans-unit.target: 較接近比到中央的大型距離旋轉和縮放作業中將不會包含任何操作工具。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to use should be based on the likely magnitude of "accidental" motions of the manipulators.
trans-unit.target: 使用一般的值應該根據"意外 「 操作工具的動作可能大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the manipulator is a human finger touching a screen, a radius corresponding to a centimeter or so might be appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果此操作工人力手指觸控螢幕，對應至公分左右 radius 可能適合。

trans-unit.source: The value for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.MinimumScaleRotateRadius%2A> must be a finite, non-negative number.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.MinimumScaleRotateRadius%2A>必須是有限的非負數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pivot information for the manipulation processor.
The pivot information for the manipulation processor.
trans-unit.target: 操作處理器的樞紐分析資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Pivot%2A> property is used to provide pivot information for single-manipulator rotations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Pivot%2A>屬性用來提供單一操作工具旋轉的樞紐分析資訊。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to null disables single-manipulator rotations.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為 null，就會停用單一操作工具旋轉。

trans-unit.source: The timestamp for the batch, in 100-nanosecond ticks.
The set of manipulators that are currently in scope.
Processes the specified manipulators as a single batch action.
The parameter `manipulators` may be an empty list or null.
trans-unit.target: 參數`manipulators`可能是空的清單或 null。

trans-unit.source: If this results in the number of manipulators reaching zero, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Completed> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果這導致數目達到零的操作工具<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Completed>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostMouseCapture%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object is overridden to call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.ProcessManipulators%2A> method with the list of <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D> objects set to null.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostMouseCapture%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件會覆寫來呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.ProcessManipulators%2A>方法的清單<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D>物件設為 null。

trans-unit.source: The timestamp is less than the previous timestamp for the current manipulation.
Parameters to set.
Sets parameters on the manipulation processor.
Occurs when a new manipulation has started.
In the following example, an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started> event checks to see if inertia processing is running and if so, stops it.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started>事件會檢查以查看慣性處理正在執行，如果是的話，就會停止它。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current set of supported manipulations.
The current set of supported manipulations.
trans-unit.target: 目前的一組支援的操作。

trans-unit.source: The property tries to set a value that is not a valid combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulations2D" />
enumeration values.
